page.title: 05 Gosforth Park Golf Centre.
page.content: On June 5th we visited Gosforth Park Golf Centre near the racecourse.First we met Andrew Meir the manager.The centre has an 18hole golf course,a bar, a cafe,driving range & a pitch and putt.Next we talked to the employees. Peter Allison,the green keeper said the best thing about his job was being outside when the hot weather came.He has met K.Keegan and Bucks Fizz.There are men's, women's and junior weekly tournaments. Then we talked to the two ladies in the cafe.Margaret Elliot has enjoyed working there for five years.The summer season is the busiest time when guests from Gosforth Park Hotel visit the centre. We talked to people playing golf. Most were members who played two to four times a week.They thought the facilities were good for novices but not for better players.
